alert.note: Alert for Plymouth (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 18 at 7:14PM CDT until August 18 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CHEROKEE AND NORTHEASTERN PLYMOUTH COUNTIES... At 714 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Remsen, or 13 miles east of Le Mars, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Marcus around 720 PM CDT. Cleghorn around 735 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Meriden and Oyens. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
